item.title: Break|Point Guide: Eldertuin The Fortress
item.author: Author
item.description: A Break|Point Guide is centered around the idea that ARPG characters should race to endgame, stopping only on specific breakpoints where there are significant upgrades available. That means running thru the story maps and stopping only to clear high density packs, whether you're playing Path of Exile, Last Epoch or Diablo.
